snippet: English County Cricket has assigned the mandatory coin flip to the dustbin after 272 years, but the overall impact of the coin toss on sports is surprising.
abstract: English county cricket will stop using coin toss at beginning of game to determine which team will pitch due to concerns that home team groundskeepers are preparing pitch to give home team advantage; coin tosses have distinguished history in variety of sports.
lead_paragraph: English County Cricket has assigned the mandatory coin flip to the dustbin after 272 years, but the overall impact of the coin toss on sports is surprising.

headline.main: Coin Toss Retains Its Place in History, if Not in Cricket
headline.print_headline: Coin Toss Retains Its Place in History, if Not in Cricket
